Headline: No trains between Forest Park and Pulaski
ShortDescription: Blue Line service continues to be suspended between Forest Park and Pulaski due to a medical emergency.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service continues to be  suspended between Forest Park and Pulaski due to a medical emergency.

As a result, trains are operating only between O'Hare and Pulaski at this time.

Shuttle buses are available from Forest Park to Pulaski to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
